name: Final Leo's Adventure
description:
As an explorer you were exploring a newly discovered cave, but as you were investigating the depths of the cave you lose consciousness…

When you wake up, you are looking at a sky, but immediately realize it doesn’t feel right. You look around and see high mountainous walls surround you and ahead is a forest…

You look around and see none of your possessions. The land doesn’t seem to be of anywhere he has been. He hears cries of animals he have never beard from far…But as an explorer you can’t stop the adrenaline rush, and decide to start walking.

 Soon he will realize it wasn’t just adrenaline that was rushing…
